## Exercise 4

```{r}
adequate_sleep <- msleep |>
  mutate(sleep14 = if_else(
    condition = sleep_total > 16, 
    true = "Adequate sleep", 
    false = "Inadequate sleep")
  ) |>
  count(sleep14) |>
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n))

ggplot(data = adequate_sleep, aes(x = "", y = prop, fill = sleep14)) +
  geom_col() +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Adequate sleep" = "green", "Inadequate sleep" = "red"))

```

## Exercise 5

```{r}
ggplot(data = storms) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind)) +
  facet_wrap(~ month)

storms %>%
  filter(year %in% c(1985, 2003)) %>%
  filter(month %in% c(6, 7, 8)) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind, color = status)) +
  facet_grid(year ~ month)

```

## Exercise 8

```{r}
storms %>%  
  filter(category > 0) %>%
  distinct(name, year) %>%
  count(year) %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_line(mapping = aes(x = year, y = n), alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = year, y = n))


```

## Exercise 9

```{r}
ggplot(data = storms, mapping = aes(x = pressure, y = wind)) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
  

centroids <- storms %>%
  group_by(category) %>%
  summarize(
    pressure = mean(pressure),
    wind = mean(wind)
  )

ggplot(mapping = aes(pressure, wind)) +
  geom_point(
    data = storms,
    mapping = aes(color = category),
    alpha = 0.2
  ) +
  geom_point(
    data = centroids,
    size = 4,
    color = "pink"
  )

ggsave(filename = "favorite-plot.png", width = 6.5, height = 4)

```
